captions.text: (Doorbell)

Away in the north pole Zanta's not dead. He's
kidnapped Santa and stolen his sled. He sent

you four singers to cause you dismay. The
sweet little angels will explode on the day.
(Beeping)
Ehh, i've heard better.
(Explosion)
Ouch! My foot!
(Music)

Why do I have to save Christmas every year?
I don't even celebrate it.

Err Edd? How are we supposed to get to the
north pole by car?
By using the Z gear of course!
(Music)
Wait a minute! How can a car fly?!

We appear to experiencing some minor turbulence.
So, please note that the seatbelt- Wait...

Do you ever wonder how planes can actually
fly? I mean, they're pretty heavy and- Uh
Oh!
We appear to be experiencing some minor turbulence...
Remember where we parked the car.

Curses! How did they survive my explosive
carollers?! I'll have to make sure th-

You know you could try being nice for once.
You are supposed to be some kind of santa.

Nice? Oh! I'll be nice! In fact, i'll give
them just what their heats desire.
So, how are we gonna find Zanta's secret lair?
Maybe we can ask in that house over there?
(Evil music)
Sounds good!
(Gasp!) Floor presents! My favourite!
(Gasp!) I'm beautiful!
Yaay money!
A Cola filled pool?! Just what i've always wanted!
ARGHHH! It burns!!
ARGHHH!! It burns!!

ARGHHHHH!! It burns!! Nobody told me money
could burn!
Hold it right there!

What are you doing here?! I gave you what
y- Wait... Weren't there four of you last time?
Oh yeah, Tord left.

Awww! He was my favourite! Hey, you don't
suppose I could take his plac-
No.

Awww! Anyway... I gave you just what your
heart desired!
Yeah well, I hope you kept the receipt!
Wow, did you really just say that? Wow...
Well, how can you defeat someone you can't... Recognise!
Erm...
Oh no! Which one do I shoot?!
Wait! Where did he get a gun from?!
I don't know!
Seriously? No, seriously?! (Sigh)
HOOHOO (In pain)
You idiot! You shot the wrong Santa!
And now it's time to finish the job! Hahaha!
Nooooo!!!
ARGHHH!!
Santa i'm so glad to SEE you made it.
I hate Christmas.
(Music)
